root.hap.responsibility

Class ResponsibilityReducer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Reducer<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.mahout.math.VectorWritable>
      • root.hap.responsibility.ResponsibilityReducer

  • public class ResponsibilityReducer
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Reducer<org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.hadoop.io.Text,org.apache.mahout.math.VectorWritable>

    Reducer class for updating responsibility.

    This reducer takes in a set of columns from the input matrices and uses their contents to update the Responsibility matrix.

    Input key [Text]: information about these columns
    Input value [Iterable<Text>]: the corresponding input columns

    Output key [Text]: tab separated list: {Row Number, Level, Matrix ID}
    Output value [VectorWritable]: vector of appropriate data

    Since:
    2013.06.25
    Author:
    Dillon Rose, Michel Rouly
    See Also:
    HierarchicalResponsibilityDriver, ResponsibilityReducer
